duration_s.description: The time it took to collect topology data

application_requests_per_hour.description: The number of requests to the web application per hour

node_cpus.description: The number of CPU cores of this node

node_cpu_utilization.description: The CPU utilization ratio of this node

node_memory_total_bytes.description: The total available memory of this node

node_memory_utilization.description: The memory utilization ratio of this node

name.description: The name of the GitLab service running on this node

server.description: The type of web server used (Puma only from 14.0)

process_count.description: The number of processes running for this service

process_memory_rss.description: The average Resident Set Size of a service process

process_memory_uss.description: The average Unique Set Size of a service process

process_memory_pss.description: The average Proportional Set Size of a service proces

machine.description: The machine hardware name of this node

release.description: The operating system release of this node

sysname.description: The operating system name of this node
